affect ( "end_yeller", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM12" );

	task ( "one" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/kam12/guard05/01carts.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_024" );
	}

	dowait ( "one" );
}


affect ( "end_doctor", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_MOOD", "Afraid" );
}
